Celebrities like Gwen Stefani and Angelina Jolie might make wearing lipstick look effortless, but Allison Joyce, a makeup artist from Salon Bi'ien in Flint, has noticed that everyday women tend to shy away from lip color. A lot of clients are afraid of lip color, Joyce said.`` They like( different lip colors) on other people, but they don't like it on themselves. I think a lot of girls just aren't sure what color to pick.''

We believe pit bulls are born dangerous. They are born with a dangerous tool set. They can use it or not use it, she said. In 2007, pit bulls and dogfighting became synonymous with Michael Vick , an NFL quarterback who served 18 months in prison over a dogfighting operation based on his property in Surry County, Va.

American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
